name: Sona
title: sona.wtf
shortDescription: Sona is designed to enhance productivity by capturing and summarizing conversations. Ideal for professionals across various fields, it supports recording, transcribing, and summarizing discussions. Whether it's a casual chat during a coffee walk or a structured online meeting, Sona works seamlessly across Apple Watch, iPhone, and Desktop. An example use case is using Sona during sales calls to ensure all details are captured without the presence of intrusive bots.
pros: No visible bots or extra devices needed
cons: Limited to Apple devices and desktop
Potential privacy concerns with conversation recording
